mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TDT.device_type FROM TB_DEVICE TD, TB_DEVICE_TYPE TDT, TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE TMDM WHERE TD.idx = TMDM.device_idx AND TDT.idx = TD.device_type_idx AND TMDM.member_idx = ( SELECT idx FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE user_id= #{userId} )

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT (SELECT TDT.device_type FROM TB_DEVICE_TYPE AS TDT WHERE TDT.idx=TD.device_type_idx) FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx=TMDM.device_idx) AS device_type FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM WHERE TMDM.member_idx IN (SELECT (SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.idx = TGMM.member_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TGMM.group_idx=(SELECT TG.idx FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.group_id=#{groupId}))

SELECT TMDM.member_idx, TMDM.device_idx, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx=TMDCM.vent_device_idx) ) FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_CONTROL_MANAGE AS TMDCM WHERE TMDCM.iaq_device_idx=TMDM.device_idx) AS vents_str, TMDM.space_idx, TMDM.station_name, TMDM.lon, TMDM.lat, (SELECT COUNT(TMDCM.vent_device_idx) FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_CONTROL_MANAGE AS TMDCM WHERE TMDCM.iaq_device_idx=device_idx) AS vent_cnt, (SELECT (SELECT TG.group_name FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.idx=TGMM.group_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TMDM.member_idx=TGMM.member_idx) AS group_name, (SELECT (SELECT TG.group_name FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.idx=TGMM.group_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TMDM.member_idx=TGMM.member_idx) AS group_name, (SELECT (SELECT TG.group_id FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.idx=TGMM.group_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TMDM.member_idx=TGMM.member_idx) AS group_id, (SELECT (SELECT TSI2.space_name FROM TB_SPACE_INFO AS TSI2 WHERE TSI2.idx=TSI.parent_space_idx) FROM TB_SPACE_INFO AS TSI WHERE TMDM.space_idx=TSI.idx) AS parent_space_name, (SELECT TSI.space_name FROM TB_SPACE_INFO AS TSI WHERE TMDM.space_idx=TSI.idx) AS space_name, (SELECT TM.user_id FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TMDM.member_idx=TM.idx) AS user_id, (SELECT TD.test_yn FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDM.device_idx=TD.idx) AS test_yn, (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDM.device_idx=TD.idx) AS serial_num, (SELECT (SELECT TDT.device_type FROM TB_DEVICE_TYPE AS TDT WHERE TDT.idx = TD.device_type_idx) FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDM.device_idx=TD.idx) AS device_type, (SELECT TD.product_dt FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDM.device_idx=TD.idx) AS product_dt FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM WHERE TMDM.member_idx = (SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.user_id=#{userId} AND TMDM.device_idx IS NOT NULL)

SELECT TMDCM.member_idx, TMDCM.iaq_device_idx, (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx = TMDCM.iaq_device_idx) AS iaq_serial_num, TMDCM.vent_device_idx AS device_idx, TMDCM.ai_mode, TMDCM.create_dt, (SELECT (SELECT TG.group_name FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.idx=TGMM.group_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TMDCM.member_idx=TGMM.member_idx) AS group_name, (SELECT (SELECT TG.group_id FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.idx=TGMM.group_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TMDCM.member_idx=TGMM.member_idx) AS group_id, (SELECT TM.user_id FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TMDCM.member_idx=TM.idx) AS user_id, (SELECT TD.test_yn FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDCM.vent_device_idx=TD.idx) AS test_yn, (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDCM.vent_device_idx=TD.idx) AS serial_num, (SELECT TDM.device_model from TB_DEVICE_MODEL AS TDM WHERE idx=(SELECT TD.device_model_idx FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx = TMDCM.vent_device_idx)) AS vent_model, (SELECT TMDM.station_name FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM WHERE TMDM.device_idx=TMDCM.iaq_device_idx) AS station_name, (SELECT TD.product_dt FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TMDCM.vent_device_idx=TD.idx) AS product_dt FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_CONTROL_MANAGE AS TMDCM WHERE TMDCM.member_idx = (SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.user_id=#{userId})

SELECT (SELECT TM.user_id FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.idx = TGMM.member_idx) AS user_id FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TGMM.group_idx=(SELECT TG.idx FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.group_id=#{groupId})

SELECT TDE.kor_name, TDE.eng_name, TDE.element_unit, TDE.element_convert, TDE.view_name, TD.device_type_idx, TDE.data_min, TDE.data_max, TDE.data_process_min, TDE.data_process_max FROM TB_DEVICE_MODEL_ELEMENTS AS TDME JOIN TB_DEVICE_ELEMENTS AS TDE ON TDME.element_idx = TDE.idx JOIN TB_DEVICE AS TD ON TD.device_model_idx = TDME.device_model_idx WHERE TD.serial_num=#{serialNum} ORDER BY FIELD(TDE.eng_name, 'noise', 'humi', 'temp', 'voc', 'co2', 'pm25', 'pm10') DESC;

SELECT (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx=TMDM.device_idx) AS serial_num FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM
TMDM.member_idx IN (
SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.user_id = #{userId} AND TMDM.device_idx IS NOT NULL
SELECT TGMM.member_idx FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TGMM.group_idx = (SELECT TG.idx FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.group_id = #{userId})
)
